attributes.action: Recall the UK ambassador in Burma and expell the Burmese ambassador in London.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Today Burma’s democracy leader, Aung San Suu Kyi, is spending her 64th birthday detained in Rangoon’s notorious Insein Prison, awaiting the verdict from the regime’s sham trial. She has already spent more than 13 years in detention and faces another 5 years in prison.

She is one of more than 2,100 political prisoners, imprisoned just for peacefully calling for freedom. They face horrific treatment in prison, banned from receiving family visits and denied proper medical care.

The peaceful people of Burma have suffered terribly for too long.  It is time the UK government took action and stopped condoning this disgrace.
